title: Build and Download Real-Time Application by Using Run on Target
introduction: The example model is a real-time model of a damped oscillator, slrt_ex_osc_rt. To open the model, in the MATLABÂ® Command Window, type: To generate C code, compile, link, and download the real-time application to the target computer, use the SimulinkÂ® Real-Timeâ¢ build process available from the Simulink Editor Real-Time tab.
